TopicTitle: KSP Military Division - Chizza's Aircraft Collection

Articles.Content:
Welcome Fellow Kerbonauts!

In my past several months of playing around with KSP, I have noticed I have been making more ships than I even use. Simply creating a ship and seeing it in the editor is just as satisfying as seeing it flying high above Kerbin's landscape. After designing and crafting multiple aircrafts, for manly military and not space purposes, I have decided to post some here on this forum to see what other people think.

Here is the link to the MediaFire folder with all the .craft files: http://www./folder/fbzbds989q576/Military_Division

50PN Drone Troop Dropper

The 50PN is a drone operated troop dropper capable of carrying six troops at a time.

50PN-2 Drone Troop Dropper

The 50PN-2 is a drone operated troop dropper capable of carrying six troops at a time. The 50PN-2 variant uses a different model of drop pods.

87-T Royal

The Royal is a single-piloted atmospheric jet, designed with three seperate fuselages. The design has been praised for it's sleekness and efficiency.

87-T2 Royal (RD)

The Royal is a single-piloted atmospheric jet, designed with three separate fuselages. The 87-T2 is a rescue variant, with an extra cockpit at the front of the plane.

'Deany' R-M8 Troop Dropper

The Deany is a short range troop dropper, capable of transporting one troop to a location quickly and covertly.

EG6 Mammoth

The EG6 is a heavy twin-engine bomber used to deliver large payloads over large distances.

Glider Prototype

This is a glider prototype designed by the same manufacturer as the R-M8. The compact design and arrow-shaped wing structure is being debated whether it is as practical and efficient as it could be.

L5-20 Troop Dropper

The L5-20 is a troop dropper which can drop upto three troops over a designated location.

N11-O Heavy Troop Dropper

The N-11O Heavy Troop Dropper is one of the best in it's class. With capabilities of carrying and dropping six troops at long ranges, this is one of the most widely used troops droppers on Kerbin.

PDS-1

A long range jet which can launch three probes into the atmosphere to record and transmit data.

R-32 Skystriker

The R-32 is a single-seat ground attack jet aircaft, used to destroy armoured vehicles by using strafing runs. It has been one of the most effective ground attack aircraft to date.

R-40 Skystriker

The R-40 is a single-seat ground attack jet aircaft, used to destroy armoured vehicles by using strafing runs. Pilot reports claim that although engine power is not as high as the R-32, maneuverability and handling is much smoother.

R-510 Heavy Troop Dropper

The R-510 has been a very effective design, with an armoured 'shell' design and room for upto four troops. This long range troop dropper has been used across many fronts and is known to be successful in all it's missions.

Tn-540 Galactic

A spaceplane with a dual-engine design, capable of providing thrust in and out of atmospheres.

TR7 Ae-S

A lightweight glider used for training and reconnaissance purposes, with an emergency abort sequence which detaches bothe wings and engines and allows the middle section to float to the ground safely.

U-PQ 'Sparrow'

The U-PQ is widely commended for its aerodynamic and unique design. It has very high soaring capabilities over long ranges despite its low engine power.

WX Carus M-5

The Carus is a slim and wide aeroglider used for reconnaissance and dive bombing purposes. It's complexity has been debated but has still been used successfully across the years

YM-X4 Interceptor

The Interceptor is a revolutionary and iconic fighter jet, famously known for it's swept wings and robust design shape.

YM-X5 Interceptor

The Interceptor is a revolutionary and iconic fighter jet, famously known for it's swept wings and robust design shape. The X5 variant uses a more powerful engine, which increases top speed and thrust.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

21-F Epsilon

The Epsilon is a jet which has been proven very worthy in dogfighting throughout the decades it has served. It has a triangular design, one most will recognise when it casts it's shadow on the landscape.

23-F Epsilon

The Epsilon is a jet which has been proven very worthy in dogfighting throughout the decades it has served. It has a triangular design, one most will recognise when it casts it's shadow on the landscape. The 23-F variant uses a frontal cockpit, without losing the overall shape of the original design.

39-F Epsilon

The Epsilon is a jet which has been proven very worthy in dogfighting throughout the decades it has served. It has a triangular design, one most will recognise when it casts it's shadow on the landscape. The 39-F uses larger tailfins for more maneuverability.

Percival 7GN-1

The Percival is a long-range stealth aircraft designed for surveillance and to coordinate satellite images.

(image to be added)

Percival 7GN-3

The Percival is a long-range stealth aircraft designed for surveillance and to coordinate satellite images. This variant has had its canards removed to compensate for heavier and more powerful engines.

(image to be added)

ZE-783 Pheonix

The ZE-783 Pheonix is a fighter jet with great manueverablility in and out of combat, with a design similar to that of the Interceptor's.

Remember that ALL .craft files are included in the MediaFire folder linked at the start.

I do hope you enjoy my collection of aircraft and I'm anticipating to add more as I create them.

Thanks -Chizza
